name: Panorama Education
long_description:
Panorama is a fast-growing national technology company focused on improving education. More than 2,000 school systems serving 15 million students across 50 states have adopted our platform to understand studentsâ€™ academic and social-emotional strengths and to identify those in need of additional support. 

School systems turn to Panorama's suite of tools to ensure that every child gets the support they need, including school climate and social-emotional learning surveys, tiered intervention planning, and professional development.
